channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The 5 Automatic Litter Boxes We've Tested and Recommend (2024)
item.description: With these high-tech cat boxes, gone are the days of bending over, scooping, and foul smells. Welcome to the future.

item.title: TikTok launches expanded subscriptions feature for creators
item.description: TikTok announced on Monday that its redesigned “Subscription” monetization offering is rolling out to eligible creators in select regions, including B...

item.title: New Cloudflare Tools Let Sites Detect and Block AI Bots for Free
item.description: “The path we’re on isn’t sustainable,” Cloudflare CEO Matthew Prince tells WIRED, in reference to rampant AI scraping. Here’s his plan to course-corre...

item.title: Pyka fields interest from defense as $40M round goes to scaling up its electric autonomous planes
item.description: Though it briefly worked on a passenger plane, the company decided after raising some money in 2022 that a cargo variant of the Pelican was more pract...

item.title: The 16 Best Hair Straighteners We Tested (2024) | WIRED
item.description: Curls and waves are beautiful. But when you want to smooth them out, these hot tools—irons, brushes, and combs—work wonders.

item.title: All Iron Ventures rebrands as Acurio Ventures with a new €150M ‘follow-on’ fund
item.description: The new fund has already made around 20 investments, and it will operate with a generalist thesis, investing across the whole of Europe © 2024 TechCru...

item.title: The 10 Best TVs We’ve Reviewed, Plus Buying Advice (2024)
item.description: From LEDs to fancy OLED models, these are our favorite televisions at every price.

item.title: Cloudflare’s new marketplace will let websites charge AI bots for scraping
item.description: Cloudflare announced plans on Monday to launch a marketplace in the next year where website owners can sell AI model providers access to scrape their ...

item.title: Why Women Get Migraines More Than Men
item.description: Women suffer from migraines three times as often as men, and often with more intensity. New research into the role of hormones is helping explain why.

item.title: Thor and Harbinger’s new hybrid RV will let you spend more time at the campsite
